Player History
Earned first career win on 5/5/1968...
Traded from Houston to Pittsburgh on 7/31/1968 (Going to PIT: P N. Briles, P D. Lemonds. Going to HOU: RF R. Maris)...
Had first career hit (double) on 9/10/1968, off Cecil Upshaw (NYM)...
Injured on 8/9/1969 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 4 weeks...
Was selected to the 1975 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/25/1978 with a Pulled Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 7-8 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 7/21/1981 to a minor league deal...
